channel.title: free will on Simon Hanzal
channel.description: Recent content in free will on Simon Hanzal

item.title: Humans and monkeys are different?
item.description: I present to you the findings which show that we can recognise objects both as literal things and symbols, whereas animals treat all objects in the world literally. It is evidence based on empirical observation of the world and which is thus factual for believers and non-believers alike. It is an outcome of an impressive work of science spanning several continents and nearly a thousand of humans and animals, published this April in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of France, doi.
